title: RANKED TEAM LOOKING FOR ADC (Gold+)
body:
Hey guys, Feind Gaming is looking for a gold+ top laner
We are looking for an ADC who is gold+ to replace our inactive ADC.
You must be available to play often, be friendly and communicate with support well.
If you are interested message me, traloop.

replies.body: I was gold in s5 just currently got re ranked into silver 5 lol if youll have me ill join as adc
Sorry dude, the positions been taken but I'll write you down as a replacement if our curent ADC quits :)
